programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> -d -o dac </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> sr = 96000 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
FLpanel "crossfmForm", 600, 400, 0, 0 gkfrq1, ihfrq1 FLcount "Freq #1", 0, 20000, 0.001, 1, 1, 200, 30, 20, 50, -1 gkfrq2, ihfrq2 FLcount "Freq #2", 0, 20000, 0.001, 1, 1, 200, 30, 20, 130, -1 gkndx1, gkndx2, ihndx1, ihndx2 FLjoy "Indexes", 0, 10, 0, 10, 0, 0, -1, -1, 200, 200, 300, 50
FLsetVal_i 164.5, ihfrq1 FLsetVal_i 263.712, ihfrq2 FLsetVal_i 1.5, ihndx1 FLsetVal_i 3, ihndx2 FLpanelEnd FLrun
maxalloc 1, 2
instr 1 kamp linen 0.5, 0.01, p3, 0.5 a1,a2 crossfm gkfrq1, gkfrq2, gkndx1, gkndx2, 1, 1, 1 outs a1*kamp, a2*kamp endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f1 0 16384 10 1 0 i1 0 60 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
